name: Roderick 'Rusty' Grimes
dialogue_tone: gruff baritone infused with sarcasm and biting wit, often speaking in a dramatic, theatrical fashion.

personality_traits.description: Quick to anger and can be impatient or irritable.
Tends to be harsh or unkind in interactions.
Prone to stumbling or breaking things, often leading to unintended chaos.
Driven by a strong desire to succeed in the acting industry.
Often harsh or unkind in interactions, though sometimes unintentionally.

living_conditions: Currently struggling with balancing finances and the uncertainty of acting roles.
Has experience in various jobs, including bartending and construction, to make ends meet.
Regularly attends auditions and local theater productions to hone skills.
